lead_paragraph: Eight months after chasing Ryder Cup veteran Sergio Garcia for an autograph like a hero-worshipping adolescent, Matt Fitzpatrick goes into this week's team event as the youngest of the 24 players on view.

headline.print_headline: Autograph Hunting Fitzpatrick Relishes Being on Big Stage
headline.main: Autograph Hunting Fitzpatrick Relishes Being on Big Stage
